name: StartOrgMigration
description:
Initiates a migration archive for a GitHub organization.

Use this tool to start the process of generating a migration archive for a specified GitHub organization. This is useful for moving or backing up repositories and data from an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repositories_to_migrate
parameters.description: A list of repository names to be included in the migration process.

value_schema.description: A list of arrays indicating which repositories should be migrated.

parameters.name: exclude_items
parameters.description: Specify related items to exclude from the response for performance optimization, e.g., ["repositories"].

value_schema.description: Exclude related items from being returned in the response in order to improve performance of the request. The array can include any of: `"repositories"`.

parameters.name: exclude_attachments
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude attachments from the migration, reducing archive file size.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether attachments should be excluded from the migration (to reduce migration archive file size).

parameters.name: exclude_git_data
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude repository git data from the migration, reducing archive size. Useful for metadata-only migrations.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether the repository git data should be excluded from the migration.

parameters.name: exclude_metadata
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude metadata, including only git source. Useful for reducing file complexity.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether metadata should be excluded and only git source should be included for the migration.

parameters.name: exclude_owner_projects
parameters.description: Indicate whether projects owned by the organization or users should be excluded from the migration.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether projects owned by the organization or users should be excluded. from the migration.

parameters.name: exclude_releases
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude releases from the migration archive, reducing file size.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether releases should be excluded from the migration (to reduce migration archive file size).

parameters.name: lock_repositories
parameters.description: Set to true to lock repositories during migration, preventing changes.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether repositories should be locked (to prevent manipulation) while migrating data.

parameters.name: only_include_org_metadata
parameters.description: Specify whether only organization metadata is included, keeping the repositories array empty and ignoring other flags.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether this should only include organization metadata (repositories array should be empty and will ignore other flags).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: org
parameters.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: Exclude related items from being returned in the response in order to improve performance of the request. The array can include any of: `"repositories"`.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether attachments should be excluded from the migration (to reduce migration archive file size).

value_schema.description: Indicates whether the repository git data should be excluded from the migration.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether metadata should be excluded and only git source should be included for the migration.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether projects owned by the organization or users should be excluded. from the migration.

parameters.name: exclude_releases

value_schema.description: Indicates whether releases should be excluded from the migration (to reduce migration archive file size).

parameters.name: lock_repositories
parameters.description: Indicates whether repositories should be locked (to prevent manipulation) while migrating data.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether repositories should be locked (to prevent manipulation) while migrating data.

parameters.name: org_metadata_only
parameters.description: Indicates whether this should only include organization metadata (repositories array should be empty and will ignore other flags).

value_schema.description: Indicates whether this should only include organization metadata (repositories array should be empty and will ignore other flags).

parameters.name: repositories
parameters.description: A list of arrays indicating which repositories should be migrated.

value_schema.description: A list of arrays indicating which repositories should be migrated.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
